sys_util.h

00022 #if !defined (__SYS_UTIL_H__)
00023 #define __SYS_UTIL_H__
00024 
00025 #include <img_defs.h>
00026 
00027 /*
00028         GTI serial data stream format is
00029         b31:20          GTI register address
00030         b19                     GTI operation. 1 = write to GTI register, 0 = read from GTI register
00031         b18:16          must be 0
00032         b15:8           data to be written or don't care if a read (use 0's)
00033         b7:0            must be 0
00034 */
00035 #define GTI_CTRL_REG_ADDR_SHIFT                 20
00036 #define GTI_CTRL_REG_ADDR_MASK                  0x00000FFF              /* 12 bits */
00037 #define GTI_CTRL_OP_SHIFT                               19
00038 #define GTI_CTRL_OP_MASK                                0x00000001              /* 1 bit */
00039 #define GTI_CTRL_DATA_SHIFT                             8
00040 #define GTI_CTRL_DATA_MASK                              0x000000FF              /* 8 bits */
00041 
00042 #define GTI_CTRL_OP_WRITE                               0x00000001
00043 #define GTI_CTRL_OP_READ                                0x00000000
00044 
00045 #define GTI_CLK_HI                                              1
00046 #define GTI_CLK_LO                                              0
00047 #define GTI_NOT_IN_RESET                                1
00048 #define GTI_IN_RESET                                    0
00049 #define GTI_NOT_TEST_MODE                               0
00050 #define GTI_TEST_MODE                                   1
00051 
00052 #define GTI_MAKE_CRTL_REG(a,b,c,d) (((a&1)<<3) | ((b&1)<<2) | ((c&1)<<1) | ((d&1)<<0) )
00053 
00054 /******************************************************************************
00055 ****************************** Macro Definitions ******************************
00056 *******************************************************************************/
00057 #define READ_REG(baseAddr, name)                                    \
00058 (                                                                   \
00059     (*(volatile img_uint32 *)(baseAddr + name##_OFFSET))                        \
00060 )                                                   
00061 
00062 #define WRITE_REG(baseAddr, name, val)                              \
00063 (                                                                   \
00064     *(volatile img_uint32 *)(baseAddr + name##_OFFSET) = (val)          \
00065 )
00066 
00067 #define READ_REG_FIELD(regval,field)                                                            \
00068 (                                                                                                                                       \
00069         ((field##_MASK) == 0xFFFFFFFF) ?                                                                \
00070         (                                                                                                                               \
00071                 (regval)                                                                                                        \
00072         )                                                                                                                               \
00073         :                                                                                                                               \
00074         (                                                                                                                               \
00075                 ((regval) & (field##_MASK)) >> (field##_SHIFT)                          \
00076         )                                                                                                                               \
00077 )
00078 
00079 #define WRITE_REG_FIELD(regval,field,val)                                                       \
00080 (                                                                                                                                       \
00081         ((field##_MASK) == 0xFFFFFFFF) ?                                                                \
00082         (                                                                                                                               \
00083                 (val)                                                                                                           \
00084         )                                                                                                                               \
00085         :                                                                                                                               \
00086         (                                                                                                                               \
00087                 (                                                                                                                       \
00088                         (regval) & ~(field##_MASK)                                                              \
00089                 ) |                                                                                                                     \
00090                 (                                                                                                                       \
00091                         ((val) << (field##_SHIFT)) & (field##_MASK)                             \
00092                 )                                                                                                                       \
00093         )                                                                                                                               \
00094 )
00095
